item.title: How to open a brokerage account
item.description: 1. Registering a Securities Trading Code (STC): Foreign investor (FI) can directly contact to the Vietnam Securities Depository (VSD) to get a trading code. However, it is recommended that FI should contact via a member of VSD (brokerage firms, banks) for more convenience. The following is required documents:
